Install a `share\rpcauth` folder using Windows installer as well?
diff_hunk:
@@ -369,6 +369,8 @@ mkdir -p "$DISTSRC"
         # has not been run before buildling, this file will be a stub
         cp "${DISTSRC}/share/examples/bitcoin.conf" "${DISTNAME}/"
 
+        cp -r "${DISTSRC}/share/rpcauth" "${DISTNAME}/share/"

body:
This diff seem required:
```diff
--- a/share/setup.nsi.in
+++ b/share/setup.nsi.in
@@ -76,9 +76,10 @@ Section -Main SEC0000
     File /oname=COPYING.txt @abs_top_srcdir@/COPYING
     File /oname=readme.txt @abs_top_srcdir@/doc/README_windows.txt
     SetOutPath $INSTDIR\share\rpcauth
-    File /r /x @abs_top_srcdir@/share\rpcauth\*.*
+    File @abs_top_srcdir@/share/rpcauth/rpcauth.py
+    File @abs_top_srcdir@/share/rpcauth/README.md
     SetOutPath $INSTDIR\share\examples
-    File @abs_top_srcdir@/share\examples\bitcoin.conf
+    File @abs_top_srcdir@/share/examples/bitcoin.conf
     SetOutPath $INSTDIR\daemon
     File @abs_top_builddir@/release/@BITCOIN_DAEMON_NAME@@EXEEXT@
     File @abs_top_builddir@/release/@BITCOIN_CLI_NAME@@EXEEXT@
```

> This diff seem required:

Incorporated this, and moved bitcoin.conf to the root of the install directory.

I've re-read [docs](https://nsis.sourceforge.io/Docs/Chapter4.html#file), only `/x` was wrong:
```diff
--- a/share/setup.nsi.in
+++ b/share/setup.nsi.in
@@ -76,7 +76,7 @@ Section -Main SEC0000
     File /oname=COPYING.txt @abs_top_srcdir@/COPYING
     File /oname=readme.txt @abs_top_srcdir@/doc/README_windows.txt
     SetOutPath $INSTDIR\share\rpcauth
-    File /r /x @abs_top_srcdir@/share\rpcauth\*.*
+    File /r @abs_top_srcdir@/share\rpcauth
     SetOutPath $INSTDIR\share\examples
     File @abs_top_srcdir@/share\examples\bitcoin.conf
     SetOutPath $INSTDIR\daemon
```

The following patch fixes `share\rpcauth\rpcauth` path:
```diff
--- a/share/setup.nsi.in
+++ b/share/setup.nsi.in
@@ -77,7 +77,7 @@ Section -Main SEC0000
     File /oname=readme.txt @abs_top_srcdir@/doc/README_windows.txt
     File @abs_top_srcdir@/share/examples/bitcoin.conf
     SetOutPath $INSTDIR\share\rpcauth
-    File /r @abs_top_srcdir@/share\rpcauth
+    File @abs_top_srcdir@/share/rpcauth/*.*
     SetOutPath $INSTDIR\daemon
     File @abs_top_builddir@/release/@BITCOIN_DAEMON_NAME@@EXEEXT@
     File @abs_top_builddir@/release/@BITCOIN_CLI_NAME@@EXEEXT@
```

I'm really sorry about the mess I created in this PR.
